mapper.insert: insert into t_return (id, projectid, type, supportmoney, content, count, signalpurchase, purchase, freight, invoice, rtndate) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{projectid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{type,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{supportmoney,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{count,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{signalpurchase,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{purchase,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{freight,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{invoice,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{rtndate,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update t_return set projectid = #{projectid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, type = #{type,jdbcType=CHAR}, supportmoney = #{supportmoney,jdbcType=INTEGER}, content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, count = #{count,jdbcType=INTEGER}, signalpurchase = #{signalpurchase,jdbcType=INTEGER}, purchase = #{purchase,jdbcType=INTEGER}, freight = #{freight,jdbcType=INTEGER}, invoice = #{invoice,jdbcType=CHAR}, rtndate = #{rtndate,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, projectid, type, supportmoney, content, count, signalpurchase, purchase, freight, invoice, rtndate from t_return where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, projectid, type, supportmoney, content, count, signalpurchase, purchase, freight, invoice, rtndate from t_return
